name: Yggdrasil (GB Studio)
description:
This demo displays the basic mechanics and concepts of the game built inside the game engine: GB Studio.

The ROM version can be played inside a Gameboy Emulator.

There's a plan to redo the game entirely in a new engine. Either in Unity or Unreal.

Features
  • Set inside a dark fantasy tree, Yggdrasil.
  • Filled with short dialogues.
  • Different masks to collect.
  • Hand-crafted pixel-art.
Credits
  • GB Studio by Chris Maltby
  • Gothic Pixel Font by Dacosta
  • Pixel art Statue by Cainos
  • Compass Pro by Eeve Somepx
